pit_north@catacomb.desc[1]:
There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  A faint glow emanates from deep
within it.
pit_north@catacomb.name: Pit_North
pit_north@catacomb.desc[0]: There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  Within it you see only darkness.

shield@catacomb.name: shield
shield@catacomb.examine:
It's rather heavy, and, being made of silver, looks quite valuable.  The coat
of arms includes the sigil of Camelot, suggesting that the original owner was
among those few honored with a seat at the Round Table.

                             |============|
                             |++#\.||./#++|
                             |...\\||//...|
                             |-==#<OO>#==-|
                              \_.//||\\._/
                               \\/.||.\//
                                \\.||.//
                                 \\||//
                                   \/

			   The Shield of Tom
shield@catacomb.desc[0]: A silver shield, bearing a striking coat of arms, lies at your feet.

dust@catacomb.name: dust
dust@catacomb.desc[0]: A thick layer of dust covers everything, and swirls around as you move.

volume@catacomb.name: volume
volume@catacomb.examine:
Fireball is an attack spell. It requires 5 mana and does 15 damage.
Sulphur will enhance its effect.  It becomes certain for knowldge 12.
volume@catacomb.desc[0]: &+YVolume XII&N of the &+WBook of Knowledge&N lies here.

cupseraph@catacomb.desc[1]: A stone cup rests upon the pedestal.
cupseraph@catacomb.name: CupSeraph
cupseraph@catacomb.examine: It looks very old, and inspires a strange sense of awe and wonder.
cupseraph@catacomb.desc[0]: A simple stone cup lies before you.

door1skeleton@catacomb.desc[1]: A massive iron door blocks your passage south.
door1skeleton@catacomb.name: Door1Skeleton
door1skeleton@catacomb.desc[2]: A massive iron door with a mighty lock bars the south passage.
door1skeleton@catacomb.desc[0]: A massive iron door lies open to the south.

pit_east@catacomb.desc[1]:
There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  A faint glow emanates from deep
within it.
pit_east@catacomb.name: Pit_East
pit_east@catacomb.desc[0]: There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  Within it you see only darkness.

mace@catacomb.name: mace
mace@catacomb.examine:
The mace consists of an iron ball, covered with deadly spikes, chained to a
wooden handle.  What else were you expecting?
mace@catacomb.desc[0]: A heavy iron mace has been dropped here.

pit_west@catacomb.desc[1]:
There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  A faint glow emanates from deep
within it.
pit_west@catacomb.name: Pit_West
pit_west@catacomb.desc[0]: There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  Within it you see only darkness.

koan@catacomb.name: koan
koan@catacomb.examine:
The koan reads:
        One day, Cedric and Ged found themselves standing at the
        entrance to the Catacombs.
        Said Ced, "How are we ever to traverse this maze of catacombs?"
        Said Ged, "I do not know, for the interconnections of its
                   chambers are most intricate.  Perhaps we should ask
                   Tedd, the Zen Master of Aber."
        So they did.
        Said Ged, "Oh wise and most learned Tedd, how can one find one's
                   way through the treacherous maze of the catacombs?"
        Said Tedd, "One can't.  Send Ned."
        And suddenly Cedric and Ged were most pleased, for Tedd had
        shown them the path to enlightenment.
koan@catacomb.desc[0]: A koan has been carved into the eastern wall.

pit_south@catacomb.desc[1]:
There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  A faint glow emanates from deep
within it.
pit_south@catacomb.name: Pit_South
pit_south@catacomb.desc[0]: There is a sacrificial pit in the floor.  Within it you see only darkness.

notebook@catacomb.name: notebook
notebook@catacomb.examine:
Most of the writing is too faint to read.  It appears to have been a diary.
The only legible parts remaining are individual phrases scattered throughout
its pages:

        long quest ... nearly ended
        who is Ned?
        lost in Catacombs
        torch exhausted
        last of my rations
        dark...  lonely...  hungry...
        a locked door ... my quest is over!
notebook@catacomb.desc[0]: An old notebook, its pages and binding in decay, has been left here.

umbrellas@catacomb.name: umbrellas
umbrellas@catacomb.desc[0]: A pile of discarded umbrellas does nothing to lift your spirits.

sledge2@catacomb.title: Southern End of the Ledge
sledge2@catacomb.description:
You find yourself at the southern end of a narrow north-south ledge
overlooking a deep, seemingly bottomless chasm.
The outline of an archway has been carved into the stone.

23@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
23@catacomb.description:
You are lost in the catacombs.  However, you notice a faint light by the
spiral stairs, apparently emanating from the room below.

13@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
13@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

sledge1@catacomb.title: Southern End of the Ledge
sledge1@catacomb.description:
You find yourself at the southern end of a narrow ledge overlooking a deep,
seemingly bottomless chasm.
An archway has been carved into the stone here.

south@catacomb.title: The South Cave
south@catacomb.description: You are in a small, unadorned cave.

crypt@catacomb.title: The Crypt
crypt@catacomb.description:
You are in a small room, standing before the entrance to a vast and ancient
crypt.  Low moaning sounds echo from within the catacombs before you, sending
chills up your spine.
   An archway, its keystone carved in the shape of a human skull, leads south
into darkness, while cool air blows in from the relative safety of the church
above.

22@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
22@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

west@catacomb.title: The West Cave
west@catacomb.description: You are in a small, unadorned cave.

2@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
2@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

foot@catacomb.title: The Foot of the Stairs
foot@catacomb.description:
You are standing in an underground cave at the foot of a set of stone
stairs which ascend to the south.  The front of the first step is decorated
with a carving of a human skull.
   To the north, an archway has been carved out of the rock wall.

9@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
9@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

closet@catacomb.title: The Closet
closet@catacomb.description:
You are in a small closet.  Discarded rags on the floor suggest that it may
once have been used as a storage area for burial cloths.  The only exit is
through the door to the north.

6@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
6@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

4@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
4@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

14@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
14@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

chasm2@catacomb.title: Suspended Above The Chasm
chasm2@catacomb.description:
You are borne up by a mysterious force. Below your feet, the chasm continues
down into darkness.  Above you, the heights of the chasm also disappear into
blackness.  To the east is solid ground: a narrow ledge.

10@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
10@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

chamber@catacomb.title: The Rough-Walled Chamber
chamber@catacomb.description:
You are in a small spherical chamber, which has somehow been carved out of
the living stone.  Although you can see no exits, the room is lit and there is
an updraft...

25@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
25@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

cavern@catacomb.title: The Cavern of the Faithless
cavern@catacomb.description:
You are standing at the bottom of a very deep chasm.  The rock walls which
which surround you on all sides vanish up into the darkness overhead.  You feel
quite daunted by the sheer weight of earth and stone which lies between you and
the surface above.

3@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
3@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

8@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
8@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

21@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
21@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

26@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
26@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

beggar@catacomb.title: The Beggar's Room
beggar@catacomb.description:
You are in a large, rectangular room.  There is a feeling of anticipation to
this place.  Doorways lead in all directions, above each is an inscription. The
northern inscription reads "Charity", the eastern says "Faith", to the south
lies "Wisdom", and "Courage" can be found to the west.  It seems there is no
"Hope" ...
   A spiral staircase runs up and down in the north-east corner of the room.

hall@catacomb.title: The Hall of Challenging
hall@catacomb.description:
You are in a large, oval-shaped chamber.  Tapestries, depicting scenes of
single combat, hang from the roof of the chamber, which is high overhead.  A
vast array of weapons and armor, from various ages, adorn the walls all about
you.  The arena is ringed with torches, burning silently.
There is an archway leading south.
There is a heavy wooden door, made of cedar and overlayed with gold, at the
northern end of the Hall.

18@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
18@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

20@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
20@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

1@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
1@catacomb.description:
You are standing in a small, subterranean chamber.  Set into the walls at
regular intervals are deep recesses, within which lie the stone tombs of a
generation long since departed.  A gentle breeze blows in from the passage to
the north, while dark hallways lead south, east, and west.
   A spiral staircase fills one corner of the room.

17@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
17@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

12@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
12@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

stairs@catacomb.title: The Stone-Carved Stairs
stairs@catacomb.description:
Here, the spiral staircase straightens out.  You may climb the stairs, or
descend to the north.

5@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
5@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

16@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
16@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

27@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
27@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

nledge2@catacomb.title: Northern End of the Ledge
nledge2@catacomb.description:
You find yourself at the northern end of a narrow north-south ledge
overlooking a deep, seemingly bottomless chasm.
The outline of an archway has been carved into the stone.

chasm1@catacomb.title: Suspended Above The Chasm
chasm1@catacomb.description:
You are borne up by a mysterious force. Below your feet, the chasm continues
down into darkness.  Above you, the heights of the chasm also disappear into
blackness.  To the east is solid ground: a narrow ledge.

24@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
24@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

rips@catacomb.title: Your umbrella rips and ...
rips@catacomb.description:
... you plummet into a small spherical chamber which has somehow been carved
out of the living stone.  Many objects litter the ground, including your
unpleasant remains ...

resting_place@catacomb.title: The Final Resting Place
resting_place@catacomb.description:
You are in a rectangular hall, with smooth stone walls, and a marble floor.
An overwhelming sense of satisfaction fills the air in this room.  Twelve
marble pillars line the eastern and western walls of the chamber.
   At the northern end of the hall is a dais, made from a single round slab of
pure gold.  There is a crystal pedestal in the center of the dais.  To the
south is a heavy wooden door, made of cedar and overlayed with gold.

east@catacomb.title: The East Cave
east@catacomb.description: You are in a small, unadorned cave.

19@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
19@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

north@catacomb.title: The North Cave
north@catacomb.description: You are in a small, unadorned cave.

15@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
15@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

nledge1@catacomb.title: Northern End of the Ledge
nledge1@catacomb.description:
You find yourself at the northern end of a narrow ledge overlooking a deep,
seemingly bottomless chasm.
An archway has been carved into the stone here.

11@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
11@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

7@catacomb.title: The Catacombs
7@catacomb.description: You are lost in the catacombs.

ghost@catacomb.name: ghost
ghost@catacomb.description: A ghostly apparition hovers about you, preparing to strike.

beggar@catacomb.name: beggar
beggar@catacomb.description: An aged and emaciated beggar sits cross-legged on a mat on the floor.

skeleton@catacomb.name: skeleton
skeleton@catacomb.description: A human skeleton stands upright before you.

defender@catacomb.name: defender
defender@catacomb.description: An ancient knight stands here, readying himself for battle.

shadow@catacomb.name: shadow
shadow@catacomb.description: A spooky black shadow, human in shape, slides across the wall.

seraph@catacomb.name: seraph
seraph@catacomb.description: An enormous six-winged seraph stands over you in solemn judgement.
